title: Replace transcription textarea placeholder with accessible French copy

requirements.text: Update the transcription textarea placeholder text in the desktop UI to a French, simple, readable sentence, replacing the current English placeholder "Your transcription will appear here..." with the exact French string: "Votre transcription apparaîtra ici…".

quotes: Remplacer cette phrase par une version 100 % française, simple et lisible

acceptanceCriteria: In the transcription textarea (frontend/src/App.tsx), the placeholder is no longer "Your transcription will appear here...".
The placeholder displays exactly: "Votre transcription apparaîtra ici…" (including the ellipsis character).
The textarea remains read-only and continues to clearly indicate that transcription text will appear in that area.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or any frontend immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Changing other UI copy or translating unrelated labels/buttons.
Changing speech recognition behavior or note storage behavior.
